snippet: Structure Tone, one of the nation’s largest construction firms, pleaded guilty to corruption charges and agreed to forfeit $55 million.
abstract: Structure Tone, one of nation's largest construction firms, pleads guilty to corruption charges and agrees to forfeit $55 million for scheme in which company defrauded prominent financial institutions, law firms and ad agencies out of tens of millions of dollars by falsely inflating subcontractors' bills.
lead_paragraph: Structure Tone, one of the nation’s largest construction firms, pleaded guilty to corruption charges and agreed to forfeit $55 million.

headline.main: Building Firm Pleads Guilty to Defrauding Its Customers
headline.print_headline: Building Firm Pleads Guilty to Defrauding Its Customers
